Thank you


Mandi Xhaferaj

Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having a problem as follows:
I bought an iPhone because I thought I had lost my previous one. But eventually, I found it in the meantime, so I have the new iPhone that I haven't opened from its original box or packaging, and I'm returning it directly without touching anything.

Thank you for your help,

Hello Pauline,
You will find attached your prepaid return label. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that best suits you to ship your package. You can find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/. 
Return preparation:
1. View instructions for returning an item <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Add all accessories provided with your item
3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector
4. Wrap your item and its accessories according to the instructions below.
Packaging of the item:
The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item in a stable position so it doesn't move during transport.
Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label is damaged.
Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case of any issues during transportation.
Your return is ready to ship! We'll notify you when it arrives.
Best regards,
Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service
